languages.text:
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only target allies who have enemies adjacent to them.
Until the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s next turn, all {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} made by the target deal additional damage equal to {uip|BonusDamage|b509a3ee5ab44253b4b859dd5f3dbffb} multiplied by the number of enemies adjacent to the target when this ability is used.
If the target is under the effect of {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g}, they immediately make an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} against an adjacent enemy, targeting the one with the lowest remaining {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.
languages.original_text: Целью могут стать только союзники, у которых на соседних клетках есть противники. До начала следующего хода {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}офицера{/g} все атаки цели в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} наносят дополнительный урон, равный значению {uip|BonusDamage|b509a3ee5ab44253b4b859dd5f3dbffb}, умноженному на число врагов, которые находятся на клетках, смежных с целью данной {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} в момент ее применения. Если на цель действует эффект Приказа командира, она немедленно совершает {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаку по возможности{/g} против врага на соседней клетке. Если таких врагов несколько, целью становится тот, у кого меньше {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}.

traits.locale_text: This ability can only target allies who have enemies adjacent to them. Until the start of the Leader's next turn, all melee attacks made by the target deal additional damage equal to (Leader's FEL bonus / 2) multiplied by the number of enemies adjacent to the target when this ability is used. If the target is under the effect of Voice of Command, they immediately make an attack of opportunity against an adjacent enemy, targeting the one with the lowest remaining wounds.

This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only target allies who have enemies adjacent to them. Until the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s next turn, all {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} made by the target deal additional damage equal to {uip|BonusDamage|b509a3ee5ab44253b4b859dd5f3dbffb} multiplied by the number of enemies adjacent to the target when this ability is used. If the target is under the effect of Voice of Command, they immediately make an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} against an adjacent enemy, targeting the one with the lowest remaining {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only target allies who have enemies adjacent to them. Until the start of the Leader's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, all {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} made by the target deal additional damage equal to {uip|BonusDamage|b509a3ee5ab44253b4b859dd5f3dbffb} multiplied by the number of enemies adjacent to the target when this ability is used. If the target is under the {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} of Voice of Command, they immediately make an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attack of opportunity{/g} against an adjacent enemy, targeting the one with the lowest remaining {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only target allies who have enemies adjacent to them. Until the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s next turn, all {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} made by the target deal additional damage equal to {uip|BonusDamage|b509a3ee5ab44253b4b859dd5f3dbffb} multiplied by the number of enemies adjacent to the target when this ability is used. If the target is under the effect of Voice of Command, they immediately make an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} against an adjacent enemy, targeting the one with the lowest remaining {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

languages.text:
Целью могут стать только союзники, у которых на соседних клетках есть противники.
До начала следующего хода {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}офицера{/g} все атаки цели в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} наносят дополнительный урон, равный значению {uip|BonusDamage|b509a3ee5ab44253b4b859dd5f3dbffb}, умноженному на число врагов, которые находятся на клетках, смежных с целью данной {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} в момент ее применения.
Если на цель действует эффект {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Приказа командира{/g}, она немедленно совершает {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаку по возможности{/g} против врага на соседней клетке. Если таких врагов несколько, целью становится тот, у кого меньше {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}.

This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only target allies who have enemies adjacent to them.
Until the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s next turn, all {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} made by the target deal additional damage equal to {uip|BonusDamage|b509a3ee5ab44253b4b859dd5f3dbffb} multiplied by the number of enemies adjacent to the target when this ability is used.
If the target is under the effect of {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g}, they immediately make an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} against an adjacent enemy, targeting the one with the lowest remaining {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Целью могут стать только союзники, у которых на соседних клетках есть противники.
До начала следующего хода {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}офицера{/g} все атаки цели в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} наносят дополнительный урон, равный значению {uip|BonusDamage|b509a3ee5ab44253b4b859dd5f3dbffb}, умноженному на число врагов, которые находятся на клетках, смежных с целью данной {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} в момент ее применения.
Если на цель действует эффект {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Приказа командира{/g}, она немедленно совершает {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаку по возможности{/g} против врага на соседней клетке. Если таких врагов несколько, целью становится тот, у кого меньше {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}.

Целью могут стать только союзники, у которых на соседних клетках есть противники. До начала следующего хода лидера все атаки цели в ближнем бою наносят дополнительный урон, равный значению (бонус ОБЩ лидера / 2), умноженному на число врагов, которые находятся на клетках, смежных с целью данной способности в момент ее применения. Если на цель действует эффект Приказа командира, она немедленно совершает атаку по возможности против врага на соседней клетке. Если таких врагов несколько, целью становится тот, у кого меньше здоровья.

Целью могут стать только союзники, у которых на соседних клетках есть противники. До начала следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} лидера все атаки цели в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} наносят дополнительный урон, равный значению {uip|BonusDamage|b509a3ee5ab44253b4b859dd5f3dbffb}, умноженному на число врагов, которые находятся на клетках, смежных с целью данной {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} в момент ее применения. Если на цель действует эффект Приказа командира, она немедленно совершает {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}атаку по возможности{/g} против врага на соседней клетке. Если таких врагов несколько, целью становится тот, у кого меньше {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}.

languages.text:
此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}只能用在与敌人相邻的盟友身上。
在{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}军官{/g}的下个回合开始之前，该盟友所有的{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}都会造成额外伤害，伤害值等于{uip|BonusDamage|b509a3ee5ab44253b4b859dd5f3dbffb}乘以能力发动时该名盟友身边的敌人数量。
如果该盟友受到{g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}指挥之声{/g}的效果影响，则该盟友会立刻对相邻的敌人发动一次{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}，攻击剩余{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}最低的敌人。
languages.original_text:
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only target allies who have enemies adjacent to them.
Until the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s next turn, all {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} made by the target deal additional damage equal to {uip|BonusDamage|b509a3ee5ab44253b4b859dd5f3dbffb} multiplied by the number of enemies adjacent to the target when this ability is used.
If the target is under the effect of {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g}, they immediately make an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} against an adjacent enemy, targeting the one with the lowest remaining {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}只能用在与敌人相邻的盟友身上。 在领袖的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始之前，该盟友所有的{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}都会造成额外伤害，伤害值等于（领袖的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}/2）乘以能力发动时该名盟友身边的敌人数量。 如果该盟友受到指挥之声的效果影响，则该盟友会立刻对相邻的敌人发动一次{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}借机攻击{/g}，攻击剩余{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}最低的敌人。

此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}只能用在与敌人相邻的盟友身上。 在领袖的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始之前，该盟友所有的{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}都会造成额外伤害，伤害值等于{uip|BonusDamage|b509a3ee5ab44253b4b859dd5f3dbffb}乘以能力发动时该名盟友身边的敌人数量。 如果该盟友受到指挥之声的效果影响，则该盟友会立刻对相邻的敌人发动一次{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}借机攻击{/g}，攻击剩余{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}最低的敌人。

此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}只能用在与敌人相邻的盟友身上。 在{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}军官{/g}的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始之前，该盟友所有的{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}都会造成额外{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，伤害值等于{uip|BonusDamage|b509a3ee5ab44253b4b859dd5f3dbffb}乘以能力发动时该名盟友身边的敌人数量。 如果该盟友受到指挥之声的效果影响，则该盟友会立刻对相邻的敌人发动一次{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}，攻击剩余{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}最低的敌人。

languages.text:
Esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} solo puede utilizarse con aliados que tengan enemigos adyacentes.
Hasta el comienzo del próximo turno del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}oficial{/g}, todos los {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} efectuados por el objetivo infligen un daño adicional igual a {uip|BonusDamage|b509a3ee5ab44253b4b859dd5f3dbffb} multiplicado por el número de enemigos adyacentes al objetivo en el momento de utilizar esta capacidad.
Si el objetivo se halla bajo los efectos de {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voz de mando{/g}, realiza inmediatamente un {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataque de oportunidad{/g} contra el enemigo adyacente al que le queden menos {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g}.
languages.original_text:
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only target allies who have enemies adjacent to them.
Until the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s next turn, all {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} made by the target deal additional damage equal to {uip|BonusDamage|b509a3ee5ab44253b4b859dd5f3dbffb} multiplied by the number of enemies adjacent to the target when this ability is used.
If the target is under the effect of {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g}, they immediately make an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} against an adjacent enemy, targeting the one with the lowest remaining {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} solo puede utilizarse con aliados que tengan enemigos adyacentes. Hasta el comienzo del próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del oficial, todos los {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} efectuados por el objetivo infligen un {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} adicional igual a {uip|BonusDamage|b509a3ee5ab44253b4b859dd5f3dbffb} multiplicado por el número de enemigos adyacentes al objetivo en el momento de utilizar esta capacidad. Si el objetivo se halla bajo los efectos de Voz de mando, realiza inmediatamente un {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataque de oportunidad{/g} contra el enemigo adyacente al que le queden menos {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g}.

Esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} solo puede utilizarse contra aliados que tengan enemigos adyacentes. Hasta el comienzo del próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del líder, todos los {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} efectuados por el objetivo infligen un daño adicional igual a {uip|BonusDamage|b509a3ee5ab44253b4b859dd5f3dbffb} multiplicado por el número de enemigos adyacentes al objetivo en el momento de utilizar esta capacidad. Si el objetivo se halla bajo los efectos de Voz de mando, realiza inmediatamente un {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}ataque de oportunidad{/g} contra el enemigo adyacente al que le queden menos {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g}.

languages.text:
Diese {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} kann nur auf Verbündete angewendet werden, neben denen sich Feinde befinden.
Bis zum Beginn des nächsten Zugs des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Offiziers{/g} fügen alle {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriffe{/g} des Ziels zusätzlichen Schaden in Höhe von {uip|BonusDamage|b509a3ee5ab44253b4b859dd5f3dbffb} multipliziert mit der Anzahl der Feinde neben dem Ziel zu, wenn diese Fähigkeit eingesetzt wird.
Wenn das Ziel unter dem Effekt von {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Stimme des Kommandos{/g} steht, führt es sofort einen {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriff{/g} gegen einen benachbarten Feind aus, wobei es den Feind mit den geringsten verbleibenden {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} anvisiert.
languages.original_text:
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only target allies who have enemies adjacent to them.
Until the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s next turn, all {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} made by the target deal additional damage equal to {uip|BonusDamage|b509a3ee5ab44253b4b859dd5f3dbffb} multiplied by the number of enemies adjacent to the target when this ability is used.
If the target is under the effect of {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g}, they immediately make an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} against an adjacent enemy, targeting the one with the lowest remaining {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Diese {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} kann nur auf Verbündete angewendet werden, neben denen sich Feinde befinden. Bis zum Beginn des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Offiziers fügen alle {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriffe{/g} des Ziels zusätzlichen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} in Höhe von {uip|BonusDamage|b509a3ee5ab44253b4b859dd5f3dbffb} multipliziert mit der Anzahl der Feinde neben dem Ziel zu, wenn diese Fähigkeit eingesetzt wird. Wenn das Ziel unter dem Effekt von Stimme des Kommandos steht, führt es sofort einen {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriff{/g} gegen einen benachbarten Feind aus, wobei es den Feind mit den geringsten verbleibenden {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} anvisiert.

Diese {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} kann nur auf Verbündete angewendet werden, die Gegner in ihrer Nähe haben. Bis zum Beginn der nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g} des Anführers fügen alle {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriffe{/g} des Ziels zusätzlichen Schaden in Höhe von {uip|BonusDamage|b509a3ee5ab44253b4b859dd5f3dbffb} multipliziert mit der Anzahl der Gegner in der Nähe des Ziels zu, wenn diese Fähigkeit eingesetzt wird. Falls das Ziel unter dem Effekt von Stimme des Kommandos steht, führt es sofort einen {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}Gelegenheitsangriff{/g} gegen einen benachbarten Gegner aus, wobei es den Gegner mit den geringsten verbleibenden {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} anvisiert.

languages.text:
Cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} s'applique uniquement aux alliés ayant des ennemis adjacents à leur position.
Jusqu'au début du tour suivant de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}officier{/g}, toutes les {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaques de mêlée{/g} menées par la cible infligent des dégâts supplémentaires équivalant à {uip|BonusDamage|b509a3ee5ab44253b4b859dd5f3dbffb} multiplié par le nombre d'ennemis adjacents à la cible lorsque cette capacité est utilisée.
Si la cible est sous l'effet de {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voix du commandement{/g}, elle lance immédiatement une {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaque d'opportunité{/g} contre un ennemi adjacent, en ciblant celui auquel il reste le moins de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g}.
languages.original_text:
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only target allies who have enemies adjacent to them.
Until the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s next turn, all {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} made by the target deal additional damage equal to {uip|BonusDamage|b509a3ee5ab44253b4b859dd5f3dbffb} multiplied by the number of enemies adjacent to the target when this ability is used.
If the target is under the effect of {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g}, they immediately make an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} against an adjacent enemy, targeting the one with the lowest remaining {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} s'applique uniquement aux alliés qui ont des ennemis adjacents à leur position. Jusqu'au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant du Leader, toutes les {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaques de mêlée{/g} menées par la cible infligent des dégâts supplémentaires équivalant à ({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FRA{/g} du Leader / 2) multiplié par le nombre d'ennemis adjacents à la cible lorsque cette capacité est utilisée. Si la cible est sous l'effet de Voix du Commandement, elle lance immédiatement une {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attaque d'opportunité{/g} contre un ennemi adjacent, en ciblant celui auquel il reste le moins de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g}.

Cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} s'applique uniquement aux alliés qui ont des ennemis adjacents à leur position. Jusqu'au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant du Leader, toutes les {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaques de mêlée{/g} menées par la cible infligent des dégâts supplémentaires équivalant à {uip|BonusDamage|b509a3ee5ab44253b4b859dd5f3dbffb} multiplié par le nombre d'ennemis adjacents à la cible lorsque cette capacité est utilisée. Si la cible est sous l'effet de Voix du Commandement, elle lance immédiatement une {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attaque d'opportunité{/g} contre un ennemi adjacent, en ciblant celui auquel il reste le moins de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g}.

languages.text: この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}は敵と隣接している味方だけをターゲットにできる。 {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}士官{/g}の次のターン開始まで、ターゲットの行うすべての{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}は{uip|BonusDamage|b509a3ee5ab44253b4b859dd5f3dbffb}の追加ダメージを与える。このアビリティ使用時に隣接している敵の数だけ倍加する。 ターゲットが指揮の声の効果を受けている場合、隣接する最も残りの{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}の少ない敵をターゲットとして即座に{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を行なう。
languages.original_text: This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only target allies who have enemies adjacent to them. Until the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s next turn, all {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} made by the target deal additional damage equal to {uip|BonusDamage|b509a3ee5ab44253b4b859dd5f3dbffb} multiplied by the number of enemies adjacent to the target when this ability is used. If the target is under the effect of Voice of Command, they immediately make an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} against an adjacent enemy, targeting the one with the lowest remaining {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}は敵と隣接している味方だけをターゲットにできる。 {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}士官{/g}の次のターン開始まで、ターゲットの行うすべての{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}は{uip|BonusDamage|b509a3ee5ab44253b4b859dd5f3dbffb}の追加ダメージを与える。このアビリティ使用時に隣接している敵の数だけ倍加する。 ターゲットが指揮の声の効果を受けている場合、隣接する最も残りの{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}の少ない敵をターゲットとして即座に{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を行なう。

この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}は敵と隣接している味方だけをターゲットにできる。 リーダーの次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始まで、ターゲットの行うすべての{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}は{uip|BonusDamage|b509a3ee5ab44253b4b859dd5f3dbffb}に等しい追加ダメージを与える。このアビリティ使用時に隣接している敵の数だけ倍加する。 ターゲットが指揮の声の効果を受けている場合、隣接する最も残り{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}の少ない敵をターゲットとして即座に{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}機会攻撃{/g}を行なう。

この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}は敵と隣接している味方だけをターゲットにできる。 {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}オフィサー{/g}の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始まで、ターゲットの行うすべての{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}は{uip|BonusDamage|b509a3ee5ab44253b4b859dd5f3dbffb}の追加{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。このアビリティ使用時に隣接している敵の数だけ倍加する。 ターゲットが指揮の声の効果を受けている場合、隣接する最も残り{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}の少ない敵をターゲットとして即座に{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を行なう。

languages.text:
Bu {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g} yalnızca bitişiğinde düşman olan dost birimleri hedef alabilir.
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Subay{/g}'ın bir sonraki turu başlayana kadar hedef tarafından yapılan tüm {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş saldırıları{/g}, {uip|BonusDamage|b509a3ee5ab44253b4b859dd5f3dbffb} ile kabiliyetin kullanıldığı sırada hedefe bitişik düşman sayısının çarpımı kadar ilave hasar verir.
Hedef, {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Emir Sözü{/g} kabiliyetinin etkisi altındaysa bitişiğinde bulunan ve {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı en az olan düşmana anında {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırısı{/g} gerçekleştirir.
languages.original_text:
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only target allies who have enemies adjacent to them.
Until the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s next turn, all {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} made by the target deal additional damage equal to {uip|BonusDamage|b509a3ee5ab44253b4b859dd5f3dbffb} multiplied by the number of enemies adjacent to the target when this ability is used.
If the target is under the effect of {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g}, they immediately make an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} against an adjacent enemy, targeting the one with the lowest remaining {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.
